TopicTitle: Wanting to find any info on Krag's PlanetFactory.

Articles.Content:
Not sure if this has been asked before but I've been scouring the internet for any old versions of Krag's planet factory. I am currently unsuccessful in finding any such files, but I wonder if any forum members here may have old versions collecting dust on their drives? I hope my question isn't violating any rules or anything, if so tell me. I'm just looking to play an old mod. 

Thanks.

There is a version of the mod on Github. This version seems to be made for version 0.23, which is a version of the game that isn't available on the KSP website anymore unfortunately.

https://github.com/Kragrathea/PlanetFactory

14 hours ago, RussianCow76 said:

There is a version of the mod on Github. This version seems to be made for version 0.23, which is a version of the game that isn't available on the KSP website anymore unfortunately.

https://github.com/Kragrathea/PlanetFactory

Thanks for the help, but the issue is resolved already. Appreciations regardless
